reviews.review: blow mind!

This game is my favorite Steam game of all time, no doubts. The gameplay, the characters, the story, it is simply phenomenal. Never has a first person puzzle game draw me back to it years later like Portal 2 was, and I doubt one ever will.

Singleplayer/Kampagne:
Ich habe jetzt die Kampgne von Portal 2 durchgespielt und muss sagen dass das Spiel wirklich sehr gelungen ist. es ist teilweise sehr lustig aber außer den bemerkungen von GlaDOS hat mich jetzt nichts wirklich zum schmunzeln gebracht.

Positiv:
-die tolle englische Vertonung (deutsche ist zwar auch gut aber ich würde empfehlen die englische Fassung zu spielen,da kommen noch mehr Emotionen rüber)
-Humor
-Testdesigns
-wirklich sehr schöne Grafik die auch mit schwächeren Grafikkarten nochh gut aussieht (ich habe momentan eine Nvidia GT 730, auf welcher es auf höchsten Einstellungen mit 30 fps läuft)
-präsize Steuerung
-die verschiedenen Gele als Gameplay Erweiterung
-das Ende
-der Turret-Chor


Negativ:
-die beiden "Bosskämpfe", welche einfach viel zu einfach waren und zu lange dauerten
-das Leveldesign,welches sich zwar in verschiedene Phase gliedert,aber... na ja das ist eher persönliche Auslegungs Sache mir wurde es gegen Ende ein wenig langweilig
(-unsichtbare Wände )

Ich habe mir das Spiel im Steam summer-Sale gekauft wo es nur 5 Euro kostete, ich würde warten bis es wieder einen Sale gibt da ich 20 Euro ein wenig zu teuer finde,ansonsten...

i r8 8/8 m8,would buy again

I dont know what there is to say about this...

This game is hands down one of my favorites, just as Portal is. A 3D puzzle game, that requires logical thinking and problem solving skills as well as an amazing story line, incredible back story and lore (as long as you look for it and realise its there) and superb narrative tallent with the main man Wheatly.

This is a game not to pass up. Its not often that I will genuinely write a review about a game I like and really heart-felt mean it...but this, this game is a must have.

This Game is GREAT sometimes it can make you sad even though the main character never talks...... THATS WEIRD
Also Puzzles
The most perfect game I ever played. Not a single bug, great humour, challenging quests.
Eszméletlen jó :)
Honestly best game ever made in gaming industry. Test your brain with loads of puzzles. If you didn't get it yet, you're doing wrong. Totally 10/10.

Portal 2 is a great game. The story keeps you interested while amusing you with hilarious dialog. once you have commpleted the story you can grab a friend and play the coop missions AND you can try community test chambers.
Portal 2 is a fantastic game... It has very good graphics and the gameplay is fun and unique...If you have not played this. get £15 and get playing!

и все
я считаю что игра стоит своих денег
This was the first Valve game I ever played. Valve is love, Valve is life.
Eins von diesen Spielen die einfach kult sind. Macht bis zum Ende Spaß und wirt nicht Langweilig.

The first time I looked at this game I didn't know if I should get it and im vary glad I did because now portal 2 is one of my favorite games mostly because of the hidden story (if you don't know what im talking about im talking about the secrets you can find in the game that tell the story behind Chell your character and GLaDOS) also i loved the first one just to let you know you should play the first one before you play the seccond one if you whant the full story. Also the cake is a lie lol

hands down 10/10 best singleplayer game i think ive ever played... and thats just the single player, playing co-op with a good friend and not being friends at the end of it because you killed eachother so much, its amazing. definatly recommend
This game is challenging but really fun. It is also funny in some parts of the game.

Have you ever wanted to drive your friend insane by messing up teamwork big time? Have you ever wanted to hear a super sarcastic roboter explain things to you? Have you ever wanted to just smack your face into your monitor because a game is so supremely annoying you want to shoot it? Have you ever wanted to eat Mayonaise with Pickled Cheeseburgers and Smores?
If you can answer all of these questions save the last with yes this is the game for you. Also if you answered the last one yes you're probably pregnant. Congratulations.
I don't wanna write all this praise again so scroll to the other 50k reviews below pls.
I really love this game! I have it on the Xbox 360 and play it all the time. I can't wait to try the "Perpetual Testing Initiative"!

Achtung! Wenn ihr glaubt Portal sei sein Preis wert muss ich euch enttäuschen! Holt es euch wenn es im Angebot ist, 8h Spielzeit für 20€ im SIngleplayer sind heute unzumutbar. 

Das Game ist dennoch Top, Atmosphere, Soundtrack und Cast sowohl auf Deutsch als auch auf Englisch.

Also Leute, auf Wunschzettel packen und warten :D

I recommend this!

But, the cake is a lie :(

Jedna z bardziej udanych produkcji od Valve.Moim zdaniem także jedna z najlepszy gier ogółem.Niesamowicie dużo wspaniałych zagadek do rozwiązania samemu,a także z kolegą (niestety nie kolegami).A kiedy już wszystko się przejdzie,a jeszcze za mało? To śmiało wchodź do warsztatu steam i pobieraj łamigłówki tworzone przez społeczność, a także twórz własne - rzecz łatwa i prosta i dostępna w samym interfejsie gry.Jeszcze jedenym plusem,o którym chciałem powiiedzieć jest to, że jeżeli gramy ze znajomym nie potrzebujemy żadnych skajpajów, teamspeaków itp. gra ma wbudowany modół rozmowy pomiędzy graczami, który działa bez zarzutu (jedyne do czego można by się przyczepić, że nie można rozmawiać podczas ładowania poziomu - ale w zasadzie nie jest to też konieczne ;) 

Podsumowując samą grę i rzeczy, które ma nam do zaoferowania śmiało daje 9,9/10 (- 0,1 za wady ujęte w nawiasach XD)
Jogo interessante e te faz pensar para passar de fase.

Un des meilleurs jeux de ces dernières années.

Un must have.
great game
Fajna gierka 8/10

Dat ending doe. 
So touching      :*(
Great Game Great Story Line And Really Funny
I rape brain, and it's funny!

Curti bastante, me destrair ao jogar um jogo totalmente diferenciado aos de costume (FPS), de bons gráficos, com uma campanha muito empolgante e que serpreendeu em relação ao Portal primeiro mesmo ao parecer igual. :D
xdd

The cake is a lie, there is only portals.

Through portals, I gain potato.

Through potato, I gain power.

Through power, I gain freedom.

Through freedom, my compainion cube is given.

The three shall set us free.

我覺得要看懂劇情的話可能要先玩過一代之後才會比較清楚
操作方式基本上跟一代沒什麼太大的差別
不過關卡的難度的確有比一代高了一些
其實傳送門這款遊戲的世界觀跟戰慄時空是有關係的
以偏好劇情為重的玩家來說值得推薦
喜歡動腦解謎的玩家也相當推薦
而且還可以跟親朋好友一起玩合作模式考驗你們的默契
2代還有工作坊的系統
可以挑戰別人創作的地圖
或者是自己創作一個新的"test"
不過當所有的"test"都完成之後
可能很難再想要回來繼續玩這款遊戲了ww
尤其是全成就達成後

畫面10/10
音樂9/10
挑戰性10/10
耐玩度8/10
劇情10/10

47/50

This game is absolutely fantastic! The puzzles are fun and challenging. Dialouge between characters is some of the best I've ever seen. The writing is fantastic. And once you complete the singleplayer, there are community maps, and co-op levels for you and your friends to complete.

Pro mě to je nejlepši logická puzzle hra! jestli máte rádí puzzle hry tak tohle je must-buy. Portal je hra kde musíte pomocí Portal Gun vytvořit modrý a oranžový portal a jít do dalšího levelu což nebude jen tak lehký protože v každé místnosti jsou nějáké překážky. Pokud váš mozek to zjistí tak se dostanete do výtahu pro další a těžší puzzles.

A really great game. Finally found time to play it and was playing it until i was so tired i got stuck on a level. would reccomend to everyone.

Valve в очередной раз порадовали своим шедевром, и я не преувеличиваю.
Portal 2 - эта одна из тех самых игр, которая запомнится навсегда.
В этой игре практически идеально все - озвучка прелестна, графика прелестна, физика прелестна, о сюжете вообще молчу!
Я поиграл в эту игру почти 12 часов, и я ранее не получал такого удовольствия и напряжения от других игр.
Те, кому не нравится эта игра, тот не умеет либо размышлять и ему лень думать логически, либо этот человек не знает что такое настоящий шедевр. (Ну у каждого свое мнение на эту тему).
Оказывается, заклятый враг, который вас пытается убить, может стать вашим лучшим другом и картошкой; а самый лучший друг может стать вашим заклятым врагом и постоянно пытается вас убить.
Оказывается обычный неприметный сарай может содержать в себе ну просто пи**ец какой огромный комплекс.
Ну так вот, кто не прошел эту игру, вы обязаны пройти ее. ОБЯЗАНЫ...

Но наш Пресвятой Габенушка не знает циферки 3, как Microsoft не знает циферки 9, так что думаю 3 части уж точно ждать не стоит.

This game is a good comination of brain power and stupidty and I would recomend the coop to anyone as me and my friends have completed it multiple times with hours of laughing and stupidty.

Happy Gaming

Un titolo rilassante, godibile, esilarante, ideale sia per casual che per "hardcore" gamer.
Valve è riuscita in pieno a migliorare tutti gli aspetti "negativi" del primo capitolo (che rimane comunque un bel gioco), combinado la giusta dose di puzzle, demenzialità e storia "strappa lacrime". Il risultato? Rimarrete incollati alla sedia, spinti dalla curiosità di vedere come va a finire, almeno così è stato per me.
Super gra! Krótka, ale trzeba przy niej trochę pomyśleć. Polecam tą grę każdemu, który lubi taki gatunek gier :)
Классная игра не чё не могу сказать но сложность...

ich persönlich kann dieses Spiel als witziges und zugleich anspruchsvolles Denkspiel abseits des Shooter/RPG-Mainstreams nur empfehlen. Der Singleplayer ist spannender und actionreicher als man erwartet und wird von Kommentaren von Glados, Wheelie und Cave Johnsons auf lustige Art bereichert. 
Der Koop-Modus mit der Möglichkeit sowohl originale als auch von anderen Spielern erstellte Rätsel mit Freunden oder Fremden zu lösen ist ebenso gelungen

as with the first portal you have to defeat a crazy robotic over lord, but the wonderful quirky tweeks they have put into this release of the game makes it all the more enjoyable, now the facility is falling to bits and you need to escape before it collapses arround you, all with a new friend who is a friendly chap if somewhat dim. again the graphics are second to none and the puzzles not too hard at all, its a fun fast paced game, and leaves you wanting more.
I love playing Portal and Portal 2. I hope they release a third and soon.
Yes.
Dialogue and characters are fun to know and hear.  There is just something about the game that in all makes it a must play.  You can beat it in a day
Just do it
very good
Jogo realmente interessante, como "puzzles" dificies e intrigantes, tornando um dos melhores jogos de raciocionio que ja joguei.

It's very good as it brought new things into portal like a way more in depth story that extends out of the game and into comics. Now one thing is that there is one bug that is serious but not game breaking which is that robot enrichment doesn't work and I've looked in the console and it seems to be missing the models for it. I gave the game almost $32 and it didn't give me anything so valve is most likely going to get sued or something like that. but other than that, it is great. everything is very refined. it is so sad that it's now died out over the years but the mod stories are keeping it alive and it is great to see it still alive in portal stories: Mel
One of my favourite game.

While I wish Valve would continue the series, it's probably best to stay at Portal 2. This game is brilliant and creative. It would be very hard to out-do it or do anything even more unique with this concept. 

Thankfully we have the creator kit and a loving community that keeps Portal alive.
